settings.location: Kundasang, Sabah
settings.shortIntroduction: Experience a perfect blend of nature and comfort at Wind Paradise, offering cozy Mongolian-style homestays and wooden lodges nestled alongside UNESCO World Heritage Kinabalu Park, providing a serene atmosphere and captivating adventures in Kundasang, complemented by stargazing and memorable moments on the BBQ and relaxation deck.
settings.shortIntroductionBm: Wind Paradise, tempat penginapan ideal bersebelahan dengan Taman Warisan Dunia UNESCO Kinabalu, menawarkan pengalaman unik dengan gaya rumah Mongolia dan keselesaan wooden lodge, sambil menikmati pelbagai tarikan dan aktiviti menarik di Kundasang sepanjang siang dan pengamatan bintang pada malam hari.
settings.landingPageNotice:
Terms & Conditions
Please read carefully.
Number Of Persons
- The term "Number of Persons" refers to the total number of individuals, including children above 12 years old.
- Bookings should be made based on the accurate number of persons intending to stay.
- Any additional individuals in your room after 9pm will be subject to applicable charges.
- Children below 12 years old are considered complimentary and can be excluded in the headcount.
- Please note that it doesn't imply unlimited accommodation for more than 2 children.
House Rules
- Guests are prohibited from accommodating extra persons in their room. Visitors arriving after 9pm will incur an additional charge of MYR 50 per person.
- Cooking is only allowed in designated areas and not within the rooms due to potential fire hazards.
- Non-halal food, Smoking, Durian, Jackfruit (Nangka), Mangosteen and pets are strictly not allowed anywhere within the premises.
- Kindly refrain from creating loud disturbances, particularly between the hours of 10pm and 7am.
- Please observe the designated check-in time of 3pm to 9pm and check-out time of 9am to 11am.
- If you require a different timing, please inform us in advance, but please note that check-in or check-out arrangements beyond midnight are not accepted.
Cancellation Policy
- All prepaid bookings are non-refundable and non-transferable.
- Cancellation requests will not be entertained once the booking is confirmed.
- Should you need to make any amendments, please provide a notice of at least 30 days prior to the scheduled date, subject to room availability.
- Failure to arrive for your reservation will result in forfeiture of the payment.
settings.landingPageNoticeBm:
Terma & Syarat
Sila baca dengan teliti.
Bilangan Individu
- Istilah "Bilangan Individu" merujuk kepada jumlah keseluruhan individu, termasuk kanak-kanak yang berumur 12 tahun ke atas.
- Tempahan perlu dibuat berdasarkan bilangan individu yang betul yang bercadang untuk menginap.
- Mana-mana individu tambahan dalam bilik selepas 9 malam akan dikenakan caj yang terpakai.
- Kanak-kanak di bawah umur 12 tahun dianggap sebagai percuma dan boleh dikecualikan daripada pengiraan bilangan.
- Sila ambil perhatian bahawa ini tidak bermakna penginapan percuma tanpa had untuk bilangan kanak-kanak yang lebih daripada 2 orang.
Peraturan Rumah
- Pelawat adalah tidak dibenarkan di dalam bilik. Pelawat yang tiba selepas pukul 9 malam akan dikenakan caj tambahan sebanyak MYR 50 seorang.
- Memasak hanya dibenarkan di kawasan yang ditetapkan dan tidak dalam bilik disebabkan risiko bahaya kebakaran.
- Makanan tidak halal, Merokok, Durian, Nangka (Jackfruit), Manggis, dan haiwan kesayangan adalah strictly not allowed di mana-mana dalam kawasan premis.
- Sila senyap terutamanya antara jam 10 malam hingga 7 pagi.
- Sila patuhi masa daftar masuk yang ditetapkan dari 3 petang hingga 9 malam dan masa daftar keluar dari 9 pagi hingga 11 pagi.
- Jika anda memerlukan masa yang berbeza, sila beritahu kami terlebih dahulu, tetapi sila ambil perhatian bahawa pengaturan daftar masuk atau daftar keluar selepas tengah malam tidak diterima.
Polisi Pembatalan
- Semua tempahan prabayar adalah tidak boleh dipulangkan dan tidak boleh dipindah-milik.
- Permintaan pembatalan tidak akan dipertimbangkan setelah tempahan disahkan.
- Sekiranya anda perlu membuat sebarang perubahan, sila berikan notis sekurang-kurangnya 30 hari sebelum tarikh yang dirancang, tertakluk kepada ketersediaan bilik.
- Kegagalan untuk tiba untuk tempahan anda akan menyebabkan kehilangan pembayaran.

information.How to book:
Booking your spot with Wind Paradise is a straightforward 3-step process:


(1) Reserve Your Spot
Visit NiceYurt.com to check availability and pricing. Complete the contact information section to place your booking.

arrowDown(2) Make Payment
Transfer the required amount to the bank account displayed on your screen. You may use any bank that is convenient for you.
arrowDown(3) Submit Payment Proof
Upload your payment proof at NiceYurt.com/payment.

âœ… Success! It's that simple.

Note:
You must complete all steps within 30 minutes, or you will need to start over.

Note for Mac/iOS user:
This app works best in the Chrome browser.

information.Car Rental: We also provide Car Rental Services, offering the flexibility for you to choose either self-driving or opt for our convenient packages with a dedicated driver and inclusive petrol.
information.View:
Situated on a higher elevation, you can enjoy exceptional panoramic view of Kundasang area.


Mount Kinabalu is directly behind us so you can see partially from here. You can see it better from the junction.


View of Mountain Kinabalu while on the way to Wind Paradise Kundasang.


Our place is best for morning sunrise and also night time (star gazing).


At night you can see beautiful view of night sky with kundasang street lights far away in the horizon.
information.Location:
Wind Paradise, Mongolian Yurt Kundasang,
KM3.8, Kampung Cinta Mata,
Jalan Mersilau, Kundasang,
Sabah.

ğŸ“ Google Map:
Mongolian Yurt Wind Paradise Lodge

Waze
Mongolian Yurt Wind Paradise Lodge

2 minutes Short Video on how to get here.

We are located 2.8km from Kundasang town, directly visible via your raw eyes. In comparison, Desa Milk is 6km from the town. So we are about half way from there.

Journey to Wind Paradise Mongolian Yurt should take less than 10 minutes from Kundasang town.
information.Direction:
Please read before you go...

From Kundasang town, go towards direction of Mersilau/Desa Milk. Go straight down the hill for 1500m until you reach a river. Then go uphill for 800m, you will see a blue signboard "Wind Paradise". That is where we are.

From there it is a 1 minute concrete road and you will reach mongolian yurt.

Do not use lowered car, any normal car can go up.
information.Suitable Cars:
What vehicle can reach Wind Paradise?
- Bicycle, Motorcycle, Car (kancil, myvi, saga), 13 seaters van like Toyota Hiace
- 4wd

What vehicle cannot reach Wind Paradise?
- Honda city, Toyota Altis, bus, sports car, Lamborghini, Ferrari, Myvilution, and all modified lowered car
- We have 4wd ready for transfer service too if needed (inform in advance, available before 8pm)

Example of cars that already reached here:

credit to YouTube Nelson

Bird Eye View of wind paradise, showing both mongolian yurt and wooden lodge, carpark, bbq area, camp site, and star gazing area

Youtube link
information.Activity Area: You can do bbq or steamboat here. Please inform in advance under special request when booking.
information.Facility:
Customers can enjoy super sunrise at relaxation deck. We also has 5 BBQ areas and steamboat areas. Normally it is enough for everyone (no need to share with other people). At night, you can also enjoy Kundasang night view and millions of stars at our new stargazing platform.

We have a big area with tables and chairs for company event. It can fits about 50 person.
information.Toilet: All rooms have private toilet with water heater inside your own room
information.Food:
[ Food ]

BBQ is a favourite activity here as the weather is cold and night view is great.
There are 5 BBQ areas where you can use for free (no extra charge). For BBQ, you need to bring along your own food, grill (3 feet x 3 feet), charcoal and other tools.

Steamboat is another simple and fun activity. Just bring your own food and everything else is readily available here. Table, chair, plates, fork and spoon are all ready for use.

For BBQ food and preparation, there is a good place to get your supplies.

Bataras Hypermarket @Tamparuli
(Located half way of KK - Kundasang)
https://goo.gl/maps/C8UM1TrmkZU2

[ Other options ]

There are also many restaurants in Kundasang town. Food is normally ok and reasonably priced. In Kundasang town, you can also find KFC, bank, grocery stores, and even a small petrol station.

For your convenience, KFC Kundasang offer delivery service to our place here. You just need to order using their app. (Last order is 6.30pm)

[ Restaurants suggestion ]

D'hati Corner Restaurant (also offer delivery service)

The Cottage - Restaurant
information.Breakfast: You can prebook breakfast at RM18 per person (inform 3 days in advance)
information.Kitchen / Cafe:
We don't have a kitchen or cafe, but you can cook using the provided bbq / steamboat tools.

If you want, the nearest cafe is just 1 minit away and have multiple choices of food.
information.Masih ada kosong?: Masih ada kosong atau tidak, boleh check terus di website. Yang ada di website, maksudnya masih ada.
information.Berapa harga semalam?: Berapa harga semalam boleh check di website. Harga berbeza ikut hari. Contohnya, hari biasa akan lebih murah dari hujung minggu dan musim cuti.
information.How to pay:
After you placed your booking, you will have bank info. Just bank in to the bank account, then submit payment proof.

Please note that a copy of your booking will be sent to your email too in case you lost your reference number.
information.Other Activities:
Enjoy superb natural phenomena.

Stargazing
Located far away from city lights, Wind Paradise is a perfect spot for star lovers.
You can even see milkyway with just your raw eyes.



Sunrise
Enjoy watching the first light of the day here,
information.Weather of Sabah:

information.Number of person:
You should always book according to the number of person including kids.
Children below 12 years old are considered complimentary and can be excluded in the headcount.
Please note that it doesn't imply unlimited accommodation for more than 2 children.
information.FAQ (number of person):
Q: I have 5 person and want to stay together?
A: Sure, just add one bed in room for 4 person, so the total would be for 5 person.

Q: I have 6 person and want to stay together?
Option 1: You can book 2 rooms for that. It is much more comfortable and you get 2 toilets (Every room has own private toilet).
Option 2: You can add 2 extra bed in some of our bigger unit.

Q: I have 7 person and want to stay together?
A: Please book 2 rooms or more for that purpose. It is much more comfortable.

Q: I have 8 person and want to stay together?
A: Please book 2 rooms or more for that purpose. It is much more comfortable.

Q: I have 9+ person and want to stay together?
A: Our place might not be suitable for you. Please look elsewhere.
information.FAQ (other):
Q: I see you have Mongolian Yurt Chalet and Wooden lodge, what is the difference?
A: Mongolian Yurt chalet is round in shape, it is based on the tradisional mongolian house by mongolian people. Wooden lodge is square/rectangular in shape, just like normal hotel rooms.

Q: Do you have carpark?
A: Yes.

Q: Someone said the road is very narrow, is it true?
A: Road to mongolian yurt is 99% asphalt (main road), with the last portion is concrete cement road. Although is a narrow road, it is only 1 minute in length.

Q: I heard we need a 4wd to go there?
A: All normal cars can reach here easily. Just do not bring your sports car. Kundasang area is better explored with a bigger car because is a hilly area. But any normal car is also possible, just slower.
